meta.title: Breaker — Trail Tech Intro Four (Director's Cut)
meta.author: Jason Silvestri
meta.inventor: This video text prompt format was invented by Jason Silvestri

character_sheet.name: Breaker
character_sheet.face: youthful; bright, curious expression; NON-HUMAN SASQUATCH FEATURES
distinctives: metal tech gauntlet on right forearm
gear: field notebook tucked at back pocket
character_sheet.feet_morphology: human-like, plantigrade: five toes, natural arch; heel-first contact
character_sheet.motivation: To make a friendly, tech-savvy first impression on an audience he's excited but nervous to meet.

constraints: The character's face MUST strictly remain non-human, consistent with a Bigfoot/Sasquatch as defined in the character sheet. Do not render a human face.
Do not render or burn-in subtitles, captions, lyrics, or any on-screen text.
No additional characters appear in frame.
Feet must be human-like, plantigrade (five toes, natural arch); no ape-like/digitigrade feet.
description: On a fern-lined logging trail at blue-hour, Breaker jogs in, quick-scans with his gauntlet, and introduces himself with a grin, trying to seem cool and collected.

setting.location: Abandoned logging road, soft dirt with ferns
setting.environment_details: Moist air haze; distant creek; occasional fireflies; wet leaf sheen
sensory_details: the scent of damp earth and pine
the crisp chill of evening air

subjects.description: 6'6" athletic Bigfoot; chestnut fur; red cap backward; rectangular glasses; headphones at neck; metal tech gauntlet (right)
subjects.action: jogs into frame, raises gauntlet for a quick scan, glances to lens with a grin, speaks, then playful tap to cap brim

camera.motion: gentle handheld follow from ~2 m back; settle to quasi-static on delivery
camera.framing: trail leading lines; ferns FG parallax; fireflies intermittent
camera.cinematographer_intent: To feel like a friendly documentarian capturing an authentic, slightly candid moment. The movement should feel natural and reactive.

effects: cool blue-hour top light with soft fill
gauntlet HUD glow reflected in glasses; two fireflies cross foreground

shots.action: Breaker jogs in; tiny splash through shallow puddle; headphones bounce
shots.foley: soft jog footfalls; damp leaf flick; fabric/fur shift

shots.action: raises gauntlet; quick scan sweep; LEDs tick
Breaker locks eyes to lens, parks stance, delivers line with bright grin
drops gauntlet; playful two-finger tap to cap brim backward; short chuckle

audio.ambient: distant creek; damp forest hush; a few night insects starting
audio.foley: soft jog footfalls; puddle splash; gauntlet servo whirr and LED clicks; cap brim tap
audio.mix_notes: keep speech forward and clean; ambience ~-14 LUFS relative; minimal reverb

speech.content: heɪ, ˈɛvɹiˌwʌn! ˈbɹeɪkɚ hɪɹ. ˈwɛlkəm tə ðə tɹeɪl.
speech.text: Hey, everyone! Breaker here. Welcome to the trail.
speech.subtext: Simple and friendly. Just a quick hello to get things started. Easy does it.

performance.lip_sync_hint: easy smile on 'guys'; clear alveolar on 'here'; brief jaw relax after ellipsis.

render_hints.skin_fur_shading: microfibers with cool top-light; gauntlet metal brushed anisotropy
render_hints.shadow_handling: lift mids to keep eye detail under cap brim
render_hints.compression: preserve fine fur and fern edges
